message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start to the game!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share, but still a decent chunk!
Meet me in the middle, a fair split that's reasonable and balanced!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still the one who's going to get the majority
Let's call it a draw, 50/50 split, no need to negotiate further!
